description_html: Portone is a task chair that brings style and functionality to the everyday office. Its fluid form is finished with timeless neutrals, exquisite aluminum detailing, and a line of design forward fabrics. Dress it fully neutral, or add a tasteful seat color accent. Portone’s pliable frame flexes to support your natural movement as the mesh cradles you. All with a beautifully integrated adjustable lumbar support that comfortably contours the curves of your back. Plus advanced ergonomic functions including synchro-recline, adjustable seat depth, and 4D adjustable arms.
